mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file ( board_seq, file_seq, board_type, user_id, originalFilename, filepath, filesize ) VALUES ( #{boardSeq}, ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(file_seq),0) +1 FROM file f WHERE board_seq = #{boardSeq} ), 'f', #{userId}, #{originalFileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize} )

INSERT INTO file ( file_seq, board_seq, board_type, user_id, originalFilename, filepath, filesize ) VALUES ( ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(file_seq),0) +1 FROM file p WHERE board_seq = #{boardSeq} ), #{boardSeq}+1, 'p', #{userId}, #{originalFileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pawmap.FILE WHERE board_type = 'p' AND USER_ID = #{userId};
